alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rio Grande and southern Saguache Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Del Norte, or 31 miles northwest of Alamosa, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Del Norte around 330 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft
